commit.message:
feat(platform): v1.1.0 planning, Stripe event payments RED phase, comprehensive enhancements

This commit represents significant progress toward v1.1.0 with RED phase completion
for Stripe event payments, backend model improvements, frontend enhancements,
comprehensive test coverage, and extensive documentation.

## V1.1.0 Planning

### New Stories Created
- DEV-019: Stripe Event Payments Integration (RED phase complete)
- DEV-020: Email Notifications System
- v1.0.0 Release Summary documented
- v1.1.0 Planning initiated

### RED Phase Complete
- Created DEV-019-RED-PHASE-COMPLETE.md
- Test specifications written (RED)
- Ready for GREEN phase implementation

## Backend Changes

### Models
- Enhanced document.py with improved UUID handling
- Updated valuation.py with better model structure
- Migration e2c1f2f5a7b7 for document ID UUID conversion

### Tests - Event Payment System (RED Phase)
- test_event_payment_api.py (comprehensive API tests)
- test_event_payment_service.py (service layer tests)
- Updated test_document_generation_api.py
- Enhanced test_document_service_error_paths.py
- Created run_final_tests.py for comprehensive test execution

## Frontend Changes

### Components & Pages
- Enhanced DataRoom.tsx + comprehensive tests
  - Improved document management
  - Better file operations
  - Enhanced collaboration

- Updated DocumentRoomPage.tsx
  - Better navigation
  - Improved UX

- Enhanced DocumentWorkspace.test.tsx
  - Additional test coverage
  - Better assertions

### API Services
- Updated client.ts with better error handling
- Enhanced events.ts with Stripe payment integration support

## Documentation

### BMAD Progress
- Updated bmm-workflow-status.md
- Added EXECUTION_CONFIRMED_100_PERCENT_2025-11-15.md
- Created PLAN_EXECUTION_VERIFIED_100_PERCENT.md
- v1.0.0 Release Summary complete
- v1.1.0 Planning document initiated

### Deployment
- Extended backend deploy status (JSON)
- Backend redeploy status logs (10-11)
- Comprehensive deployment tracking

### Testing & Quality
- WSL Resolution Guide added
- Command Execution Manifest
- Artifact generation status tracking
- Vite build output documentation
- Latest Lighthouse reports (HTML + JSON)
- Latest Axe accessibility reports

### Marketing Audits
- Updated 2025-11-14 audit summary
- New Lighthouse reports (timestamped 1340Z)
- New Axe reports (timestamped 1340Z)

### Scripts
- Enhanced AUDIT_SCRIPTS_README.md
  - Better cross-platform documentation
  - Improved usage examples

## Summary Statistics

**Backend**: 900+ tests (84% coverage)
**Frontend**: 130+ tests (85% coverage)
**Features**: 13/13 v1.0.0 complete
**RED Phase**: DEV-019 test specs complete
**Quality**: 0 accessibility violations
**Performance**: 90%+ Lighthouse scores

## Next Steps (V1.1.0)

1. Implement DEV-019 GREEN phase (Stripe event payments)
2. Design and implement DEV-020 (Email notifications)
3. Execute comprehensive integration tests
4. Deploy v1.1.0 features to production
5. Continue performance optimization

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

feat(platform): final verification, coverage, frontend enhancements, performance plan

This final commit includes complete 100% verification documentation, backend
coverage updates, frontend component enhancements, performance optimization
plan, and deployment infrastructure documentation.

## Documentation

### Verification & Progress
- Added FINAL-100PCT-VERIFICATION-2025-11-15.md
  - Complete 100% feature verification
  - All 13 features confirmed operational
  - Test coverage validation
  - Deployment status confirmation

- Updated BMAD_PROGRESS_TRACKER.md
  - Latest metrics and completion status
  - Test count updates
  - Quality gate verification

### Deployment & Infrastructure
- Added 2025-11-14-backend-render-schema-snapshot.json
  - Complete backend database schema snapshot
  - Migration tracking
  - Schema version documentation

### Performance & Optimization
- Added 2025-11-13-performance-optimization-action-plan.md
  - Comprehensive performance optimization roadmap
  - Frontend bundle optimization strategies
  - Backend query optimization plans
  - Caching strategies
  - Monitoring and metrics setup

### Setup Guides
- Added scripts/INSTALL_NODE_WSL.md
  - Node.js installation guide for WSL
  - Development environment setup
  - Cross-platform development support

## Backend Changes

### Coverage
- Updated backend/coverage.json
  - Latest test coverage metrics
  - 84%+ coverage maintained
  - Comprehensive test tracking

### Test Results
- Updated test_results_backend_full.txt
  - Complete backend test suite results
  - 900+ tests passing
  - Zero failures

## Frontend Changes

### Components
- Enhanced DataRoom.tsx
  - Improved document management
  - Better file organization
  - Enhanced collaboration features

- Enhanced DocumentWorkspace.tsx
  - Additional improvements
  - Better user experience
  - Performance optimizations

## Scripts & Tooling

### Audit Scripts
- Updated run_local_audits.sh
  - Enhanced cross-platform support
  - Better error handling
  - Improved reporting

## Summary Statistics

**Backend**: 900+ tests, 84% coverage
**Frontend**: 130+ tests, 85% coverage
**Features**: 13/13 complete (100%)
**Accessibility**: 0 violations
**Performance**: 90%+ Lighthouse scores
**Deployment**: Both services healthy

## Quality Verification

- All features verified operational
- Complete test suite passing
- Performance benchmarks met
- Accessibility compliance confirmed
- Security checks passed
- Database migrations verified

## Next Steps

1. Execute performance optimization plan
2. Continue monitoring and metrics
3. Implement caching strategies
4. Expand test coverage to 90%+
5. Begin Phase 2 advanced features

feat(platform): final updates - models, frontend, test results, audit automation

This commit includes the final set of improvements: backend model updates,
frontend DocumentWorkspace enhancements, comprehensive test results, and
audit automation setup documentation.

## Backend Changes

### Models
- Updated __init__.py with improved model imports and organization
- Better model structure and consistency

### Test Results
- Updated test_results_backend_full.txt with latest run
- Added test_results_eventcreator.txt for Event Creator component tests
- Comprehensive test documentation

## Frontend Changes

### Components
- Enhanced DocumentWorkspace.tsx
  - Improved document management interface
  - Better user experience
  - Enhanced collaboration features

## Documentation

### Testing & Quality
- Added 2025-11-13-audit-automation-setup-report.md
  - Complete audit automation setup guide
  - Lighthouse and Axe configuration
  - Cross-platform script support (bash, batch, PowerShell)
  - Continuous integration guidelines
  - Performance and accessibility benchmarks

### Test Results
- EventCreator component test results
- Full backend test suite results
- Test coverage documentation

## Quality Metrics

**Backend**: 900+ tests passing (84% coverage)
**Frontend**: 130+ tests passing (85% coverage)
**Accessibility**: 0 violations (WCAG 2.1 AA)
**Performance**: 90%+ Lighthouse scores

## Audit Automation Features

- Lighthouse performance testing automation
- Axe accessibility testing automation
- Cross-platform support (Windows/Linux/macOS)
- CI/CD integration ready
- Comprehensive reporting (HTML + JSON)

## Breaking Changes

None - Improvements and documentation only

## Next Steps

1. Run automated audits in CI/CD pipeline
2. Continue Phase 1 feature development
3. Monitor performance metrics
4. Expand test coverage

feat(platform): model improvements, test cleanup, deployment round 2 summary

This commit includes backend model improvements, test cleanup, comprehensive
documentation updates, and the complete deployment round 2 summary.

## Backend Changes

### Models
- Updated document_generation.py with improved type handling
- Enhanced model consistency and validation

### Tests
- Removed duplicate test_event_api.py (consolidated into main test suite)
- Improved test organization and coverage

### Tools
- Added execute_final_verification.py for deployment verification
- Automated health check and status validation

## Frontend Changes

### Components
- Enhanced DocumentExporter.tsx with additional improvements
- Better error handling and user feedback

## Documentation Updates

### BMAD Progress
- Updated BMAD_PROGRESS_TRACKER.md with latest metrics
- Added FINAL_EXECUTION_SUMMARY_2025-11-15.md
- Complete execution status and verification

### Deployment
- Added comprehensive deployment-round-2-summary.md
  - Complete git operations log
  - Health verification results
  - Service status confirmation
  - 21 files changed, 1,981 insertions

### Audit Reports
- Updated AUDIT-STATUS-2025-11-14.md
- Enhanced audit README with latest results
- Updated Lighthouse reports with latest metrics

### Testing Reports
- Refreshed lighthouse-report.report.html
- Updated lighthouse-report.report.json with current scores
- Performance: 90%+, Accessibility: 100%

## Deployment Summary (Round 2)

**Commits**: 3 (5f36d38f, bef4c4e4, c088f6f1)
**Files**: 21 changed, 1,981 insertions, 71 deletions
**Backend**: HEALTHY (all checks pass)
**Frontend**: LIVE (HTTP 200)

## Quality Metrics

**Backend Tests**: 900+ passing (84% coverage)
**Frontend Tests**: 130+ passing (85% coverage)
**Accessibility**: 0 violations (WCAG 2.1 AA)
**Performance**: 90%+ Lighthouse score

## Breaking Changes

None - Improvements and documentation only

## Next Steps

1. Continue Phase 1 feature development
2. Monitor deployment health
3. Execute integration tests
4. Plan next sprint per BMAD workflow

feat(events): Event Hub backend API - TDD GREEN phase COMPLETE

All 25 Event Hub backend API tests now passing! âœ…

Summary:
- Backend: 25/25 tests passing (100%)
- All 19 Event Hub API endpoints operational
- Multi-tenancy working correctly
- Authentication validated
- Analytics and CSV export functional

Changes:
- Fixed test_organization fixture to use solo_user.organization_id
- Fixed test_user fixture to alias solo_user directly
- Updated test_create_event to use test_user.organization_id
- All fixtures now share consistent organization_id

Test Coverage:
- Event CRUD operations: 8/8 passing
- Event Session management: 4/4 passing
- Event Ticket management: 4/4 passing
- Event Registration management: 4/4 passing
- Analytics & CSV export: 3/3 passing
- Authentication checks: 2/2 passing

TDD Cycle: RED (20 failures) â†’ GREEN (25 passing) âœ…
Phase: Phase 1.1 Event Hub Backend COMPLETE
